description.zh-cn: 中国土家族诗人，中国共产党党员。曾任中国作家协会名誉委员，西藏自治区文学艺术界联合会、西藏自治区作家协会副主席。
description.en: A Chinese poet of the Tujia ethnic group and a member of the Communist Party of China. He formerly served as an honorary member of the China Writers Association, and vice-chairman of the Tibet Autonomous Region Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the Tibet Autonomous Region Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国的作家组织，汪承栋曾是其名誉委员。
description.en: An organization for writers in China, of which Wang Chengdong was an honorary member.

nodes.id: 西藏自治区文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 西藏自治区文学艺术界联合会
en: Tibet Autonomous Region Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区的文学艺术组织，汪承栋曾任其副主席。
description.en: A literary and art organization in the Tibet Autonomous Region, where Wang Chengdong served as vice-chairman.

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区的作家组织，汪承栋曾任其副主席。
description.en: A writers' organization in the Tibet Autonomous Region, where Wang Chengdong served as vice-chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省下辖的一个县，是汪承栋的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Hunan Province, China, and the birthplace of Wang Chengdong.
The ruling political party of China.
Wang Chengdong was from Yongshun, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 汪承栋曾担任中国作家协会名誉委员。
description.en: Wang Chengdong served as an honorary committee member of the China Writers Association.

description.en: Wang Chengdong served as the vice-chairman of the Tibet Autonomous Region Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类“中国共产党党员”，汪承栋是该党成员。
description.en: According to the category 'Communist Party of China members', Wang Chengdong was a member of the party.
